metadata.title: CVE-2013-7469 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Seafile through 6.2.11 always uses the same Initialization Vector (IV) withCipher Block Chaining (CBC) Mode to encrypt private data, making it easierto conduct chosen-plaintext attacks or dictionary attacks.

criterions.comment: seafile package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
